bounce{0%,to{transform:translateY(0)}50%{transform:translateY(-8px)}}@keyframes rotate{0%{transform:rotate(0deg)}to{transform:rotate(1turn)}}@keyframes pulse{0%{transform:scale(1)}50%{transform:scale(1.26)}to{transform:scale(1)}}@keyframes color-change{0%{fill:red;color:red}25%{fill:#1e90ff;color:#1e90ff}75%{fill:#32cd32;color:#32cd32}to{fill:red;color:red}}@keyframes intro-shifting-x{0%,to{opacity:0;transform:translateX(10vw)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateX(0)}}@keyframes intro-shifting-y{0%,to{opacity:0;transform:translateY(-50vw)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}}@keyframes outro-shifting-x{0%,to{opacity:1;transform:translateX(0)}to{opacity:0;transform:translateX(100vw)}}@font-face{font-family:Circle;font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:url(__VITE_ASSET__WAJbe2Q4__) format("opentype")}@font-face{font-family:Circle-Thin;font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:url(__VITE_ASSET__F8sl7hDB__) format("opentype")}#getstarted-page{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:column;height:100%;justify-content:center;margin:2rem 0}#getstarted-page .getstarted-container{border-radius:1.5rem;box-shadow:0 1px 3px #d7d2c1,0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.24);overflow:hidden}#getstarted-page .getstarted-container nav#getstarted-views-nav{background-color:#fbfaf9;height:3.5rem;position:relative;width:35rem}#getstarted-page .getstarted-container nav#getstarted-views-nav>a{font-size:1.3rem;height:100%;width:17.5rem}#getstarted-page .getstarted-container nav#getstarted-views-nav>a#log_in,#getstarted-page .getstarted-container nav#getstarted-views-nav>a#sign_up{border-bottom:2px solid #f6a462;color:#f6a462}#getstarted-page .getstarted-container nav#getstarted-views-nav>a.active{background-color:#fff!important;border:none!important;color:#221f16!important;font-size:1.2rem}#getstarted-page .getstarted-container section#getstarted-layout{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:column;height:100%;overflow:hidden;width:35rem}#getstarted-page .getstarted-container section#getstarted-layout #log-in-page,#getstarted-page .getstarted-container section#getstarted-layout #sign-up-page{padding:1.5rem 0 2.5rem;width:100%}
